Posts.EditableText:
I'm trying to figure out how I can use the picture frames to display in the UI in a specific order. I've been able to put an image into my command bar, but can't seem to figure out how to move things around plus I have some questions. I would like for the organization of my UI elements to be top to bottom Compass - Picture Frame - Inventory - Place and Objects. Currently, it's just Compass - Inventory - Places and Objects. I'm pretty noobish at the JS implementation, so I've mostly been trying to make an abomination of code based off of other answers I've found on the forums similar to what I am looking for with no success.

If I do images from a local file will that load fine into the Quest Online player?
Posts.HTML:
I'm trying to figure out how I can use the picture frames to display in the UI in a specific order. I've been able to put an image into my command bar, but can't seem to figure out how to move things around plus I have some questions. I would like for the organization of my UI elements to be top to bottom Compass - Picture Frame - Inventory - Place and Objects. Currently, it's just Compass - Inventory - Places and Objects. I'm pretty noobish at the JS implementation, so I've mostly been trying to make an abomination of code based off of other answers I've found on the forums similar to what I am looking for with no success.

If I do images from a local file will that load fine into the Quest Online player?
